79796192ec90263f21b464d5bc90b777a525971d3de8232be80d9c4f9fb353b8","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fda447a62815e8064f47eff0dd1cf58d9207ad69b5d32280f8d7ed1d1e4621","dweb:/ipfs/QmfDRc7pxfaXB2Dh9np5Uf29Na3pQ7tafRS684wd3GLjVL"]},"src/VaquitaPool.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb6e1878a07b1c8d4fdf0264167473ec28ffd177c0dde4c69dc6bcc4a1cd66f8b","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://9312504b62f3d6e356b42f689b2c47d9ff9dff297dca7a948b343f7f1898cfdf","dweb:/ipfs/QmQiGjZKYnRxEdyQhhNCQXJDFvnqKFELFB8UixkCxZxDDE"]},"src/interfaces/external/IPermit.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3140fa41e3dd009da1aa56fffcf11ca68025da8f9726500c67e6dda8d16a315f","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://69b30713ab6fb4b094e9cce3a8fffa2fb38eb478a5fa45fd92aed81b2a31bb9e","dweb:/ipfs/QmetAFjAhyPGxDWzBTDnFkJz6iytBMBSPJct4ApAnfnGxJ"]},"src/interfaces/external/IPool.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb6fad6901d2f002b2149a80d26e3fcca86eccb01a1b7d3c686d32e843892f3f9","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://56ac5876c3d4550b2b9482fb914d9ce47ca1345bd03ae59be2740097bedaacee","dweb:/ipfs/Qmaikh4EhVKibHqARdH9jRHS7rR96TdgeXovTcLCbg4iN4"]}},"version":1}

addLockPeriod(uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner.

params.newLockPeriod: The new lock period in seconds.

addRewards(uint256,uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner. Transfers tokens from the owner to the contract. Emits a {RewardsAdded} event.

params.period: The lock period to add rewards to.
params.rewardAmount: The amount of tokens to add to the reward pool.

deposit(bytes16,uint256,uint256,uint256,.details: Uses permit if available, then transfers tokens and supplies to Aave.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit.
params.deadline: The deadline for the permit signature.
params.depositId: The unique identifier for the position.
params.period: The lock period chosen for this deposit.
params.signature: The permit signature for token approval.

returns._0: The amount deposited. Emits a {FundsDeposited} event. Requirements: - `amount` must be greater than 0. - `depositId` must not be zero or already used.

returns.period: The lock period for this position.

returns.currentValue: The current total value of the position.

params._aavePool: The address of the Aave pool contract.
params._lockPeriods: The array of supported lock periods (in seconds).
params._token: The address of the ERC20 token to be used for deposits.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only callable by the contract owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only callable by the contract owner.

updateEarlyWithdrawalFee(uint256).details: Only callable by the contract owner. Reverts if the new fee exceeds BASIS_POINTS. Emits a {EarlyWithdrawalFeeUpdated} event.

params.newFee: The new early withdrawal fee in basis points.

params.depositId: The ID of the position to withdraw from.

returns._0: amountToTransfer The amount of tokens transferred to the user. Emits a {FundsWithdrawn} event. Requirements: - The position must exist and be active. - The caller must be the position owner.

withdrawProtocolFees().details: Only callable by the contract owner when not paused. Emits a {ProtocolFeesWithdrawn} event.

addLockPeriod(uint256).notice: Adds a new lock period to the supported list.

addRewards(uint256,uint256).notice: Adds rewards to the reward pool for a specific lock period.

deposit(bytes16,uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Opens a new position by depositing tokens into the pool.

getPosition(bytes16).notice: Returns the details of a position.

getPositionValue(bytes16).notice: Returns the current value and interest for a position.

initialize(address,address,uint256[]).notice: Initializes the VaquitaPool contract with the given token, Aave pool, and lock periods.

isSupportedLockPeriod(uint256).notice: Checks if a lock period is supported.

pause().notice: Pauses the contract, disabling deposits and withdrawals.

unpause().notice: Unpauses the contract, enabling deposits and withdrawals.

updateEarlyWithdrawalFee(uint256).notice: Updates the early withdrawal fee (in basis points).

withdraw(bytes16).notice: Withdraws funds from a position, including principal, interest, and rewards if eligible.

withdrawProtocolFees().notice: Withdraws accumulated protocol fees to the owner.
